attributes.action: Mr Cameron to deliver a response to the Vote of No Confidence towards his Secretary of State for Education
attributes.additional_details: No action or response has been given by the Prime Minister towards the vote of no confidence that has been passed by all major teaching unions. Mr Cameron must listen to the people that his Secretary of State affects the most and shouldn't allow Mr Gove to continue on his freight train approach towards education. Mr Cameron should make his views clear, taking into account how many teachers disagree with all of the rapid, and sometimes unnecessary, reforms.
